TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PayloadSerializer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the serialization for a specified convention.
Docs.remarks:
The serializer is responsible for converting all of your objects into the correct format for the that uses it.
By default we have implemented the class that uses to handle the serialization for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected PayloadSerializer ();

Protected Sub New ()
public abstract string ContentType { get; }
.property instance string ContentType
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
member this.ContentType : string

Docs.summary: Used to specify what type of content to expect.
Docs.value: A string representing the content type to use when sending a payload.
Docs.remarks: This can be free-form but should adhere to standard MIME types. For example, "application/json" is what we implement by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract T ConvertFromObject<T> (object objectToConvert);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T ConvertFromObject<T>(object objectToConvert) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ConvertFromObject(Of T) (objectToConvert As Object) As T
abstract member ConvertFromObject : obj -> 'T

Docs.summary: Converts the object using the serializer.
Docs.remarks: This class is used by the PayloadCollection-based classes to attempt to convert from the native serializer type (for example, JObject or JsonElement) to the desired type. When you implement this you need to be aware of what type your serializer will use for anonymous types.

Docs.param: The status code of the write operation.
The version the property is responding to.
An optional description of the writable property response.
Docs.summary: Creates the correct to be used with this serializer.
Docs.returns: The writable property response to be used with this serializer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool TryGetNestedObjectValue<T> (object nestedObject, string propertyName, out T outValue);

Public MustOverride Function TryGetNestedObjectValue(Of T) (nestedObject As Object, propertyName As String, ByRef outValue As T) As Boolean
abstract member TryGetNestedObjectValue : obj * string * 'T -> bool

Docs.typeparam: The type to convert the retrieved property to.
Docs.param: The object that might contain the nested property.
The name of the property to be retrieved.
Docs.summary: Gets a nested property from the serialized data.
Docs.returns: True if the nested object contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, it returns false.
Docs.remarks: This is used internally by our PayloadCollection-based classes to attempt to get a property of the underlying object. An example of this would be a property under the component.
